description:
The tyrant of the Ark has been defeated, but just when it seems like peace had finally returned to the city, a new threat appears. 

A hulking behemoth named Revenant arrives with an undead army in tow to try and take over the Ark. Itâ€™s up to you to foil his plans and save the city!

Contains all-new missions and an original story featuring a truly fearsome foe.

*This content can only be played after completing the main story.
name: DEADCRAFT - It Came From the Junkyard
